contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | image = | image_width = | image_caption = | regnum = [[Fungi]] | divisio = [[Ascomycota]] | classis = [[Sordariomycetes]] | ordo = [[Meliolales]] | familia = [[Meliolaceae]] | genus = '''''Xenostigme''''' | genus_authority = [[Syd.]] (1930) | type_species = ''Xenostigme trichophila'' | type_species_authority = Syd. (1930) | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision = ''[[Xenostigme trichophila|X. trichophila]]''<br> ''[[Xenostigme paradox|X. paradoxa]]'' }} '''''Xenostigme''''' is a [[genus]] of [[fungi]] within the [[Meliolaceae]] family.<ref>{{cite journal |last=Lumbsch TH, Huhndorf SM. |year=2007 |month=December |title=Outline of Ascomycota – 2007 |journal=Myconet |volume=13 |issue= |pages=1–58 |id= |url=http://www.fieldmuseum.org/myconet/outline.asp |accessdate= |publisher=The Field Museum, Department of Botany, Chicago, USA }}</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{IndexFungorum|5824}} [[Category:Meliolaceae]] {{Sordariomycetes-stub}}
